title: Top Gear Movie Collection
description:
This is a collection I made of all the Top Gear films ever made except one, which is "Back in the Fast Lane". I couldn't find this anywhere on any private or public trackers. However, that particular film is only consisting of "Best of"-clips from the 1st and 2nd series of the TV show, so you won't miss anything if you have seen the show.


All of the other films are independantly of the highest quality there is of all the releases I have found, and I looked pretty much everywhere.

Included in this torrent is:

Top Gear: Uncovered (2009) 352p TV
Top Gear: Apocalypse (2010) 352p TV
Top Gear: At The Movies (2011)576p DVD
Top Gear: The Worst Car in the History of the World (2012) 1080p BD
Top Gear: The Perfect Road Trip (2013) 400p TV
Top Gear Festival: Sydney (2013) 1080p BD



Below is a list of all existing Top Gear productions (for your information).

I made this because I'm a huge fan of the show, but please consider to buy the collection on DVD/BD if you enjoyed it :)


Top Gear films:

Top Gear: Back in the Fast Lane (2003)
Top Gear: Uncovered (2009)
Top Gear: Apocalypse (2010)
Top Gear: At The Movies (2011)
Top Gear: The Worst Car in the History of the World (2012)
Top Gear: The Perfect Road Trip (2013)
Top Gear Festival: Sydney (2013)


Top Gear TV shows

Top Gear - The old show (1978-2002): 45 series
Top Gear - The current show (2002-): 21 series per 2014
--------------
Top Gear USA - A poorly executed mimic of the real UK show (2010-)
Top Gear AUS - A poorly executed mimic of the real UK show (2008-2011)
